content: for a quick and dramatic diy project try this jumbo crochet lumbar pillow using bernat blanket big splash you ll work in the round in a continuous spiral the half_double_crochet stitches work up fast and squishy without having to worry about joining rounds three colorways inspire but you can select any shade to make it the perfect accent for your home materials bernat® blanket big™ 10 6 oz/300 g 32 yds/29 m gray splash 51096 or green splash 51093 or caramel splash 51097 2 balls or 52 yds/47 5 m measurements approx 14 35 5 cm tall x 17½ 44 5 cm wide
